```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
all_data <- read.csv("reading_neutrality_pilot-merged.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(all_data)
```


```{r}
all_data %>%
  filter(trial_id != 'example') %>%
  group_by(condition,form) %>%
  filter(form == 'from') %>%
  summarise('time' = mean(rt)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=condition, y=time)) + 
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
filtered_data <- all_data %>%
  filter(trial_id != 'example' & region == "critical")
```


```{r}
linear_regression <- lm(rt~condition + , data=filtered_data)
```

```{r}
summary(linear_regression)
```
